name: Project128
description:
Made in 6 hours (and a lot of other limitations) using gamemaker.

limitations:

maximum of 5 images (can be spritesheets (must be 128x128 or less)).

only use the Pico-8 color palette.

maximum of 10 fps for each sprite.

only 4 instruments per song.

only 4 track channels per song.

room resolution must be 128x128.

all assets must be made in the time limit.

maximum of 12 hours to make the game.

if you think i should remake retro games in this style, comment down below, and i'll pick the most commented choice.
